Category:The Empire Strikes Back radio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Ken Hiller narrated the radio dramas of Star Wars, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi. He also was the narrator of Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama, Dark Forces: Rebel Agent audio drama and Dark Forces: Jedi Knight audio drama.
